slashCommands.name: comment
slashCommands.description: Write comments for the highlighted code

slashCommands.name: share
slashCommands.description: Export the current chat session to markdown

slashCommands.name: commit
slashCommands.description: Generate a commit message for the current changes

slashCommands.name: so
slashCommands.description: Reference StackOverflow to answer the question

customCommands.name: check
customCommands.description: Check for mistakes in my code
customCommands.prompt:
{{{ input }}}

Please read the highlighted code and check for any mistakes. You should look for the following, and be extremely vigilant:
- Syntax errors
- Logic errors
- Security vulnerabilities
- Performance issues
- Anything else that looks wrong

Once you find an error, please explain it as clearly as possible, but without using extra words. For example, instead of saying 'I think there is a syntax error on line 5', you should say 'Syntax error on line 5'. Give your answer as one bullet point per mistake found.

customCommands.name: test
customCommands.description: Write unit tests for highlighted code
customCommands.prompt: Write a comprehensive set of unit tests for the selected code. It should setup, run tests that check for correctness including important edge cases, and teardown. Ensure that the tests are complete and sophisticated. Give the tests just as chat output, don't edit any file.

quickActions.title: Unit test
quickActions.prompt: Write a unit test for this code. Do not change anything about the code itself.

quickActions.title: Detailed explanation
quickActions.prompt: Explain the following code in detail, including all methods and properties.
